channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The shocking $4.7 billion ruling against the NFL could disrupt the balance of power between the league and its teams
item.description: The NFL has kept its members happy by signing massive TV deals that makes everyone rich.

item.title: Beryl strengthens into a hurricane in the Atlantic, forecast to become a major storm
item.description: Beryl strengthened into a hurricane on Saturday as it churned toward the southeast Caribbean.

item.title: Bond market braces for bigger deficits under either Trump or Biden
A loophole in U.S. tariffs on Chinese EVs has allowed a flood of golf cart imports, and domestic producers are asking Biden for help
item.description: “Chinese import volumes have rapidly increased, taking greater consumer vehicle market share while using price benefits from Chinese government subsidies to drive their advantage.”

item.title: Goodyear, Arizona to Fort Myers, Florida: 10 fastest-growing retirement hot spots in the U.S.
item.description: Four of the top 10 retirement hot spots are in Florida. The Sunshine State also had the most cities in the top 50 list.

item.title: Here’s what Trump and Biden got wrong about Social Security in their debate
The owner of Redbox DVD kiosks just filed for bankruptcy, saying results ‘failed to meet management’s expectations’
item.description: Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment—the seller of self-help books, film and television content—filed for Chapter 11 protection in Delaware late Friday.

item.title: These 3 daily practices are the Japanese 'secret' for a 'long and happy life,' says 'Ikigai' authors
item.description: Okinawa, Japan has the highest concentration of centenarians worldwide. Here are three principles that may lead to their longevity.

item.title: Trump and Biden dodged a question on child-care costs. Parents aren't pleased.
Astronauts aren’t stranded on the space station, NASA says, while troubleshooting on Boeing’s Starliner capsule continues
item.description: It's now three weeks and counting for Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams as NASA and Boeing troubleshoot equipment problems.

item.title: Biden campaign fundraises $27 million after first debate
item.description: President Biden raised $85 million in May, lagging Donald Trump's $141 million.

item.title: Biden and Trump largely skipped over record-high housing costs at debate
Execs should urge workers to return to the office to help San Francisco, Fed president says
item.description: "Talk about what you need to fix and also encourage your people to come back to work," San Francisco Fed President Mary Daly said.

item.title: Growth, value stocks could see boost from Russell rebalancing
item.description: This key market event could help boost growth and value stocks. Here’s why.

item.title: S&P 500 clinches double-digit gain in first half of 2024 as stock rally persists
